title: ST_Union_Agg
description: Returns a geometry that represents the point set union of all geometries.
kernels:
  - returns: geometry
    args: [geometry]
---

## Examples

```sql
SELECT ST_Union_Agg(geom) FROM (
  VALUES
    ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON ((0 0, 0 2, 2 2, 2 0, 0 0))'),
    ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON ((1 1, 1 3, 3 3, 3 1, 1 1))')
) AS t(geom);
```
